column5: ~~~Putting together a M&G at the Rock & Reel on April 5/08 in Oshawa, it's a Saturday night, and what could be better then sharen a Drink in a place that has a Bar, and Tackle Shop combined. They have expanded, so there will be more gear to look over and argue about as to what to buy and why you just have to have it. Hope some of you guys can make it and meet some new, and old buds
rock and reel is a cool place get a beer by a lure its a cool idea guy that owns it is cool to he always orders stuff he doesnt have !!
Too bad i gotta work   on apr 05 otherwise i join you for sure. Does Ian still own the place?  He's a great guy   .
